definitions.definition: One who founds or establishes (a company , project , organisation , state , etc.).
examples: The founder of Facebook is Mark Zuckerberg .

definitions.definition: ( genetics ) A common ancestor of some population (especially one with a certain genetic mutation ).

main_definition: One who founds or establishes (a company , project , organisation , state , etc.).
secondary_definitions: ( genetics ) A common ancestor of some population (especially one with a certain genetic mutation ).

definitions.definition: The iron worker in charge of the blast furnace and the smelting operation.
One who casts metals in various forms ; a caster .
examples: a founder of cannon, bells, hardware, or printing types

main_definition: The iron worker in charge of the blast furnace and the smelting operation.
secondary_definitions: One who casts metals in various forms ; a caster .

definitions.definition: A severe laminitis of a horse, caused by untreated internal inflammation in the hooves .

main_definition: ( veterinary medicine ) A severe laminitis of a horse, caused by untreated internal inflammation in the hooves .
